 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָבַק‎</span>] **verb** ==clasp, embrace== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַבֵּק‎</span>; Mandean <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, NSyriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> II. ***collect*** one's possessions, etc., [[BDB#Frey|Frey]]) — 

**Qal** ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַחֲבוֺק‎</span> [[Eccl.3.5|Eccl 3:5]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֹבֵּק‎</span> [[Eccl.4.5|Eccl 4:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֹבֶקֶת‎</span> [[2Kgs.4.16|2Kgs 4:16]] — ***embrace***, with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּן‎</span> [[2Kgs.4.16|2Kgs 4:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָדָיו‎</span> [[Eccl.4.5|Eccl 4:5]] (said of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַכְּסִיל‎</span> = fold his arms, i.e. be idle; compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חִבֻּק‎</span>); no object expressed [[Eccl.3.5|Eccl 3:5]] (\|\| **Pi\`el**). **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חִבְּקוּ‎</span> [[Job.24.8|Job 24:8]]; [[Lam.4.5|Lam 4:5]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְחַבֵּק‎</span> [[Gen.48.10|Gen 48:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְחַבֶּקֿ‎</span> [[Gen.29.13|Gen 29:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְחַבְּקֵהוּ‎</span> [[Gen.33.4|Gen 33:4]] 3 feminine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּחַבְּקֵ֫נִי‎</span> [[Song.2.6|Song 2:6]]; [[Song.8.3|Song 8:3]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּתְחַבֵּק‎</span> [[Prov.5.20|Prov 5:20]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּחַבְּקֶ֫נָּה‎</span> [[Prov.4.8|Prov 4:8]] ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַבֵּק‎</span> [[Eccl.3.5|Eccl 3:5]] — ***embrace*** of person, no object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עת לִרְחֹק מֵחַבֵּק‎</span> [[Eccl.3.5|Eccl 3:5]] (\|\| **Qal**); followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> [[Gen.29.13|Gen 29:13]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Gen.48.10|Gen 48:10]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); followed by suffix [[Gen.33.4|Gen 33:4]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Prov.4.8|Prov 4:8]]; [[Song.2.6|Song 2:6]]; [[Song.8.3|Song 8:3]] with accusative [[Prov.5.20|Prov 5:20]] embrace <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צוּר‎</span> for want of shelter [[Job.24.8|Job 24:8]] (of poor); embrace refuse-heaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אשׁפתות‎</span> [[Lam.4.5|Lam 4:5]], i.e. are outcasts.
